articles.description: Man Utd loanee Jadon Sancho was described as "rejuvenated" as Borussia Dortmund beat PSG in Champions League semi-final first leg.
articles.title: Jadon Sancho: Borussia Dortmund winger shines against PSG in Champions League

articles.description: It is 30 years since the death of Ayrton Senna. Sid Watkins, the man who tried to save him, was a close friend who led two safety revolutions within Formula 1.
articles.title: Sid Watkins, Ayrton Senna and Formula 1's safety revolution

articles.description: Niclas Fullkrug scores a brilliant first half winner as Borussia Dortmund beat Paris St-Germain 1-0 in a frenetic first leg of their Champions League semi-final.
articles.title: Fullkrug goal earns Dortmund first-leg win over PSG

articles.description: Judd Trump suffers a shock 13-9 loss to Jak Jones in the quarter-finals of the World Championship at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield.
articles.title: Judd Trump suffers shock quarter-final loss to Jak Jones

articles.description: Chelsea manager Emma Hayes believes the race for the Women's Super League title is "done" after her side were beaten 4-3 at Liverpool on Wednesday.
articles.title: Liverpool 4-3 Chelsea: Emma Hayes says WSL 'title race done' after Blues loss

articles.description: Five-time Olympic champion Sir Steve Redgrave has warned paying prize money to athletics gold medallists at Paris 2024 will divide athletes.
articles.title: Olympic prize money will divide athletes says Sir Steve Redgrave

articles.description: The Premier League misses out on a fifth Champions League spot next season.
articles.title: Fifth Champions League spot: Premier League misses out to Germany on extra place for 2024-25

articles.description: Russian seventh seed Andrey Rublev ends Carlos Alcaraz's dominance at the Madrid Open with a 4-6 6-3 6-2 win.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Carlos Alcaraz title defence ended by Andrey Rublev

articles.description: Red Bull confirm their design chief Adrian Newey will leave the team in 2025.
articles.title: Red Bull confirm designer Adrian Newey exit

articles.description: Former captain Steve Smith is left out of Australia's squad for June's T20 World Cup.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Australia omit Steve Smith as Mitchell Marsh named captain
